Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the sale of helium inflated balloons
Summary: Prohibits the sale of helium inflated balloons except for scientific purposes.
LawCode: Add ยง399-jj, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of helium inflated balloons
